name: ralph kerns
text: Fast service ok food

name: Jade Parker
text: I have never gotten a fresh pizza from here, we try again every few months in hopes of change but no luck. Hot and ready at dinner time always looks like they were made as soon as they open and some of the workers can be pretty rude. My best advice is pay $1 or $2 more and go to Pizza Hut.

name: nolia
text: There is about 11 people in this small place. We ordered two pizzas, cheese and pepperoni, itâ€™s taken 15 min just to get the food out. Really thinking these people are mentally challenged so Iâ€™m trying to be patient with them but Iâ€™m about to get feisty up in here.

name: KaylaKayKat
text: Great pizza!

name: Dwain Della
text:
The level of unprofessionalism and rudeness displayed by the ladies running this place is crazy. No gloves or hair nets either.
Good pizza though.

name: Jimmie Sweat
text: First time I ordered here back in April, it took 45 minutes to get the food and when we got home it was not even cooked all the way. Today I thought to give them another try and was disappointed again! The pizza tasted like a day old pizza that was hard as a rock from sitting in the warmer all day. Nasty and will not eat there again

name: michael bohaty
text: Brought back some great memories!! Good service, nice people:)

name: John Louis
text: First of all, they overcharge for their pizza's. Everywhere else in the country that I've been to,a hot and ready is $5 and the extra most bestest is a dollar more, making it $6. They charge $6 and $7.65 respectively. Secondly, the staff is â€¦More

name: Rachael Rice
text: If your looking for a cheap bite to eat it's a great place to go. They have really stepped up the quality of the pizza in the last few years.

name: jon klein
text: This place is a rip off. when the deep dish pizza first came out it was really deep dish. now it is just a chunk of bread with a slight covering of sauce and small toppings. Also the place has gotten very dirty and the staff has no clue. â€¦More

name: Shirley Bailey- Love
text: This place is so nasty they have there hair hanging down an don't wear gloves. I ordered the ultimate supreme and it was NOT worth 9 dollars. If I was showed this b4 leaving I wouldn't of took it. It only had pepperoni an hamburger an 5 lil â€¦More

name: Shay InkLuv
text: Great service ,no problem with any orders , quick and convenient ðŸ‘Œ

name: lexi christeson
text:
Usually have a good experience here until today..
The girl who worked register was very rude, messed up my order but was fixed.
But when I got home there was no sauce for my breadsticks:(

name: Summer Williams
text: I used to love this place but quality and service are grossly lacking now. I got 2 pizzas, bread sticks, sauce, and a Pepsi tonight. To my dismay it was all completely soggy and cold. I called to tell them and someone picked up the phone â€¦More

name: Patsy Herndon
text: Great food and excellent customer service

name: Angela Burggraf-Hattok
text: Also friendly and food is always hot and good.

name: Ryan Janasz
text:
Didn't have my order of 45 pizzas ready, but they did get the the order done in 20 min. My sass level was too high to care. Like seriously I was fighting back the sassiest comments ever.
10/10 would sass again

name: David Massey
text: It, ah, is good as long as you eat the pizza while it's hot.

name: nathan schwarz
text: Doesn't offer half of what all other little caesars do. Place always looks dirty, employees lack great hygeine practices, hot n ready through 8pm. Yet i go there usually between 6-7pm every other week and have to wait 10-15 minutes.

name: Matt Osthoff
text: Horrible service! The manager and staff are completely disorganized. If it weren't for the cheap pizzas I'd never go to this place.

name: David Carter
text: Tasty pizza. Price always seems a bit higher than the ads, though.

name: Juan Magana
text: Great service an hotnready pizza

name: Ken Jordan
text: Fast easy pick up.

name: Chicken Smith
text: Won't pick up the phone most of the time. Gets orders wrong half of the time.

text: Terrible service waited over an hour for food and when I got my order it wasn't complete
